answers.answer: Hi,How old are you?When have you noted this?Has this been present for a long time or have you only noted this recently?Are there any varicose veins in the area?Any underlying conditions like diabetes and hypertension?Any known allergies?

question: I have a raspberry colored spot on my calf about 4 inches up from my inside ankle.Any thoughts on what it might be?This discussion is related tohttp://www.medhelp.org/posts/show/242684.
title: Round Red Spot
